__e: Some, like you, Otis, have more than one.
I'll let you go. right now... I'm hunting different prey.
Certainly many of you have more than I do, as many more of you have much less than I.
My friend, you men own the world and all that's in it.
It seems I don't have a thing which they have, what is it?
The only thing these victims have in common in that they were fathered by the same man; that's it.
With Bobby dead, you and Sam are all each other has.
I know they have a plan. We need to find out what it is.
And that'll be the list of people who have one.
They're not even happy with a big house.
They just feel like they own a part of him or something.
Naturally, you went for your weapon only to learn, as so many gun owners tragically do, that you're far more likely to have that very weapon used against you.
His ship and the people on it hold the key to where we came from.
We've given you much more than most parented children have.
You told me you turned it in.
